usa.title: California Roofing Trends & Local Insights | IB Roofing (ibroofingca.com)
usa.description: Explore California roofing trends, climate-driven material choices, energy-efficient solutions, and regional permitting tips. Practical guidance for repairs, replacements, and maintenance. Call for a free estimate: [phone].

roof-types.title: Roof Types Explained: Shingle, Metal, Tile, Flat & Their Uses | IB Roofing
roof-types.description: Learn which roof type—asphalt shingle, metal, clay/concrete tile, flat/TPO, or cedar—best suits your California home or business. Pros, lifespans, and maintenance tips to help you decide. Schedule an inspection: [phone].

roof-materials.title: Best Roofing Materials for California Homes | Asphalt, Metal, Tile & More
roof-materials.description: Compare asphalt shingles, metal roofing, tile, cedar, and single-ply systems for durability, cost, and energy efficiency in California climates. Expert material recommendations and installation quotes at IB Roofing: [phone].
